Girdle

A girdle is a semi-permeable membrane of mana-infused anicca separating a Creation from the Great Beyond.

It serves as an advanced form of vessel which retains a great many atman. While a new atman may enter into the timeline of the Creation at any point, bringing with it a store of mana, this is the only method by which new mana may enter. No atman may thereafter leave, nor any mana except by a fissure. Anicca is permitted to travel freely into and out of a girdle.

A girdle need not appear at any literal location within the Creation's space.

Fissure

A fissure is an artefact in a girdle which allows for mana to leave its Creation into Great Beyond. These frequently feature in the design of Creations as a method of restricting their lifespan.

Just as with the girdle, a fissure need not appear at any literal location, but it may do so even if the girdle itself does not. Black holes in Totum are an example of faux-fissures appearing at a physical location, while the Totum girdle itself does not.

Faux-fissure

A faux-fissure may appear to any educated perception to be a fissure, but in fact siphons mana into a bladder rather than into Great Beyond. mana may then be brought back into the Creation by some Internal Mechanism, or Predestined Event.
